experience: You and Matt both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Trish Bear, and 116 others

OH Partners is an independent national creative communications agency that has crossed the chasm between the traditional agency business of the past and the dynamic, digital agency of the present.We are a "rapid response agency" that produces work that works...fast and effectively with ideas that breakthrough.We pride ourselves in being indispensable partners that are result-centric, problem-solvers with a broad cross-section of industry, non-profit, and government agency expertise.We study and mine consumer, market and competitive insights to fully understand the landscape.We move the needle (and a lot of them) quickly because we know our clients do not have unlimited time, patience, or budgets.We are a virtual one-stop superstore with proven in-house advertising, video production, graphic design, media planning & buying, public affairs, social media, digital development, marketing research, strategy and Public Relations experts.      - Solution agnostic      - Outcome driven      - Seamlessly integrated

If you are looking for the best, smartest, most committed marketing organizations around, Owens Harkey & Associates is the right choice. If you want some suck ups that tell you they have all the answers and you shouldn’t worry then you won’t enjoy how we do things.We are here so your organization can flourish and we will stay focused on the goal of making those dreams your reality.

I was honored to join Cobalt when it was incredibly small compared with what it has grown into today. I think I was the 13th or 14th team member and saw our efforts blossom at a very rapid rate in my years with the company. I was the first hire in the Marketing Department and performed a lot of different functions for the company while I was there. I got travel the country and meet a ton of automotive dealers along with working with some great manufactures as well. It was a time of change in the automotive market place and Cobalt was on the bleeding edge. Lots of hard work and bold actions saw the company grow to over 450 staff members while I was there. Eventually I simply burned out and moved on but still have a very warm spot in my heart of Cobalt and all of the great people there. I learned how to manage growth and over come fear of failure while I was there and wouldn't trade the experience for the world.
Chairperson of the Board - Arizona Chapter

I am proud and honored to be asked to step up and help families obtain positive outcomes by doing everything we can to have babies born at full term and without problems. We can all agree that they deserve the best beginning to life we can give them. Let's save babies!

February 23, 2009, Matt worked with Andrew in the same group

I have known Matt for 35 years. I grew up with him, went to high school with him, shared a multitude of cherished experiences with him and owned and ran a business with him. And I'd do it all over again in a heartbeat.Not only is Matt a person of rare class and integrity, he is a true professional and the best friend and confidant you could ever desire.  As a marketer, Matt works both smarter and harder than anyone else I have ever known. Some do one or the other. Matt does both. He works smart naturally - he's just wired to sense the right moves and act quickly - and he works hard out of sheer desire to move the needle and make good things happen for his clients. I witnessed this first-hand.When it comes to media strategies and tactical planning and buying, Matt has to be considered one of the best, if not THE best in the region. Clients praise the value he delivers and media outlet personnel love to work with him. Amazing.As for general marketing and brand-building knowledge, Matt has brings it in spades. From retail to B2B to start-up to non-profit to traditional to e-media to local to national, Matt has four words going for him:  "Been there, done that." He is smart and intuitive with an uncanny ability to peg the right approach, the right message and the right vehicle to solve a specific challenge or meet a certain goal. He can sense the big picture and architect the plan and he sees well all the way through execution.Two specific factoids come to mind in my time working professionally with Matt:  1. We won over 80% of all competitive new client pitches, reviews or opportunities that we participated in over our six-plus years as Owens/DePoy.2. In virtually every one of our client engagements, we delivered positive impact to the customer's bottom line.Make no mistake...Matt led the way.There's hiring for fit. There's hiring for skillset. There's hiring for results.  Want the trifecta?   Hire Matt.

October 13, 2010, Matt managed Caitlin directly

We search for a very long time to find a talent like Caitlin. She has a natural eye for design that stands out from the crowd. We have people try out for entry level positions at our company and have had over seven interns to date. Caitlin is the only intern to have earned a full time position with Owens Harkey. She convinced us to hire her though exceptional work and the attitude only a super star possesses. Caitlin always goes above and beyond the call and consistently delivers exceptional graphic design on time and on target. We are fortunate to have her on our team!

Scott Harkey

June 18, 2009, Scott worked with Matt in the same group

It isn't often you come across someone who has the skills, intuition and integrity that makes you take pause and wonder how they came to be. Scott is far more than the simple sales person he was for quite a few years, he is one of the best intuitive marketers I have ever met. His decisions are always sound and his commitment to client success is unmatched in this industry. This guy will go the extra mile every time and he will do it with a smile on his face. Plus, he will never sacrifice his integrity for personal benefit. He may be young but when you can associate yourself with a true prodigy you just do it! Try working with him and I am sure you'll agree.
